thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 10 of 171
thread.title: John Maloney

author: John Maloney
title: John Maloney
text:
We registered with three house sitting agencies. Of the three, we find Trusted House Sitters to be the best. The range of 'sits' is matched by the quality of information provided.
The website is easy to navigate.
The vetting process was appropriately stringent, allowing both home-owners and sitters to feel confident.
We will continue to use the site for as long as we are 'sitting houses', and recommend them heartily..
John and Juliet.
